description:
Master the Ins and Outs of Microsoft Visio and Create Incredible Diagrams.

In Master Microsoft Visio 2013, get up to speed using Microsoft's handy diagramming program. Great for building both org charts and flowcharts, Visio 2013 is a simple way to map out technology assets, process enhancements, networks, and other business functions. It's also an ideal way to generate seating charts and floor plans for events.

Contents and Overview

The course is designed for individuals and office professionals who need to master the capabilities of the latest edition of Microsoft Visio.

Through over 10 hours of video lectures, exercise files, and an optional quiz, you'll learn everything you need to know to create sophisticated Visio diagrams using Visio 2013.

Find out how to manipulate and connect shapes, add pictures, and ensure perfect object alignment. Discover how to create sophisticated diagrams that impress your clients and co-workers and make you look like a diagramming pro.

When you complete this course, you'll be well on your way to becoming a master of using Visio with the tools available in Microsoft Visio 2013.

This course includes:

  • Exercise files
  • An optional quiz to test what you've learned
  • Certificate of completion

All of our videos are high-definition videos, therefore, they are best viewed with the HD setting on, and the videos enlarged.
title: Master Microsoft Visio 2013 the Easy Way
